thread.title: Arsenal fans BEG Arsene Wenger to sign Monaco ace Kylian Mbappe « Arsenal News 24-7
thread.title_full: Arsenal fans BEG Arsene Wenger to sign Monaco ace Kylian Mbappe « Arsenal News 24-7

title: Arsenal fans BEG Arsene Wenger to sign Monaco ace Kylian Mbappe « Arsenal News 24-7
text:
No Comments » Kylian Mbappe caught the eye for Monaco (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal fans were begging Arsene Wenger to sign Monaco forward Kylian Mbappe after watching his brilliant performance against Manchester City in the Champions League. 
The Frenchman’s emerged as one of the brightest young talents in the world and has been compared to both Neymar and Thierry Henry. 
Manchester United CEO Ed Woodward tells star he can leave IMMEDIATELY 
Wenger spoke enthusiastically about the 18-year-old earlier this month and admitted that the Gunners were tracking the teenager. 
Tonight’s clash at the Etihad was the first time for many to see the youngster in action and Gooners were begging Wenger to sign the forward after his impressive display. Mbappe is the real deal, what I’d give for him at arsenal. 
— Rahul (@rahuliole) February 21, 2017 Mbappe would look good in an Arsenal shirt. 
— Seymour (@renegadedme) February 21, 2017
